item.title: WordWrap
item.description: How To Play WordWrap 1. Guess the WordWrap word in 6 tries. 2. Each guess must be a valid 5-letter word. 3. The color of the tiles will change to show how close your guess was to the word. Examples: R : R is in the word and in the correct spot. S : S is in the word but in the wrong spot. E : E is not in the word in any spot.
